title: Data-Driven Web App for Smart Energy Agriculture

abstract.description: POC website leveraging NASA open data to assist farmers in energy-efficient agriculture.

detail.context: Farmers often lack access to accurate, data-driven insights for energy-efficient practices.
detail.approach: Built a POC web app integrating open NASA datasets to provide actionable recommendations.
detail.solution_description: The app processes data from open APIs to guide farmers on energy-efficient strategies.
detail.pros: Practical data-driven solution, team collaboration, ranked highly.
detail.cons_and_improvements_ideas: Demo not available, screenshots only; could be improved with a fully deployed web app.
